title: Expert
description: Congrats, but go outside now and then.
captions: Bill Walsh certainly qualified as an expert coach in the Super Bowl.  Getty Images

title: Knowledgeable
description: Old enough to remember single-Roman-digit games.
captions: Steve Young only started one Super Bowl, but he was great in that one game.  Doug Collier/ Getty Images

title: Average
description: Hears of Brett Favre, but not Bart Starr.
captions: For all his greatness, Brett Favre was a very average 1-1 in the Super Bowl. Andy Lyons / Getty Images

title: Meh
description: It's not all about the nachos and beer, ya know.
captions: There's nothing wrong with being a casual fan. Jerry Telfer / The Chronicle

title: Failure
description: You go shopping on Super Bowl Sunday, huh?
captions: Were you as bored as the Chiefs' EJ Holub before Super Bowl I? Bill Ray/The Life Image Collection
